def is_prime(n):
    if n == 2 or n == 3: return True
    if n < 2 or n%2 == 0: return False
    if n < 9: return True
    if n%3 == 0: return False
    r = int(n**0.5)
    f = 5
    while f <= r:
        if n%f == 0: return False
        if n%(f+2) == 0: return False
        f +=6
    return True

def is_prime_digit(n):
    while n > 0:
        if not is_prime(n%10):
            return False
        n /= 10
    return True

print is_prime_digit(int(raw_input()))
